main_description: meet the most precise grain sampling method ever made
features_article_accurate: The drone flies over the grain and gets numerous samples. It makes sure you can have a clear decision on the grain's quality.
features_article_analytics: Cropler tells you the amount of grain you are about to sample and design the samplying route by itself
features_article_infrared: The built-in NIR quality check gives you immediate results on the grain's quality
features_article_map: After the quality is analyzed, the software creates the quality map of your grain pile
work_article_easy: With one simple click on your smartphone the drone takes off and recognizes the grain pile by itself and creates a sampling route
work_article_confirm: The route will be based on international sampling standards and on the amount of the actual grain pile. You can confirm or adjust the route.
work_article_automatic: The drone takes samples across the sections of the pile, with the help of a vacuum system. The method takes about 10 seconds per sample.
work_article_immediate: Quick and accurate results based on the taken samples and the results of the NIR analyzation system, which include protein, moisture, gluten, and ash level measurements.
why_title: Do you need a grain sampling system that is fast and accurate?
why_article: Alzagro Cropler makes the sampling method a whole lot easier.
why_article_quality: Make sure you purchase and deliver the proper quality to your customers.
why_article_seconds: When accuracy and speed are the key to a satisfied customer.
why_article_support: The best quality check of grain, quick decision making on a delivery
why_article_better: Better estimation for grain value and easier trading decisions
testimonial_description: With Cropler, I can easily determine the quality of the grain on the spot, which gives us a huge advantage against our competitors.
